programme.title: 150,000 more troops to Iraq
programme.short_synopsis: Will an increase of troops in the Gulf have an effect on George Bush's approval ratings?
programme.medium_synopsis: President Bush sends more troops in to the Gulf, the public confusion around the reasons for intervention, and the effect on Bush's approval ratings.
